text: Walter Keith Thomas (28 July 1929 â€“ 5 October 2021) is an English former footballer. He played as a right winger. Thomas was born in Oswestry, Shropshire. He was also a schoolteacher. During the 1950s, Thomas made 97 appearances in the Football League for Sheffield Wednesday, Cardiff City, Plymouth Argyle and Exeter City. He rejoined his youth club Oswestry Town as player-manager in 1957. In 1959, he joined Welsh side Pwllheli in the same position. ==References== Category:1929 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Cardiff City F.C. players Category:English footballers Category:People from Oswestry Category:Plymouth Argyle F.C. players Category:Sheffield Wednesday F.C. players Category:Sportspeople from Shropshire
title: Keith Thomas (English footballer)
